page.title: 18Gourdon Bowling Club
page.content: A meeting organised by{Gourdon {Community Council}was held in 1979 to try to set up a committee for a Recreational Club, with the purpose of starting{carpet bowls. A sponsored walk was proposed for fund raising and this was a great success. The sum raised was Â£316.99 which was used to pay for two sets of bowls. Sidlaw Industries kindly gifted two bowling mats. The bowling opened on the 3rd Oct 1979. There are around 40 to 50 members every year who play for a singles, doubles and mixed doubles trophy. The club has a pool table which attracts younger members who also enjoy taking part in the bowling competitions. The season runs from {October to April,}meeting on Wednesday and Friday evenings.
